gaia::ui::WidgetAnimator Class Reference

Base class for a FrameController container that will perform animations when switching between its views. More...

#include <WidgetAnimator.h>

Detailed Description

Base class for a FrameController container that will perform animations when switching between its views.

Definition at line 30 of file WidgetAnimator.h.
